user.title: Heater Configuration
user.description: Connect to your boiler via EMS-ESP. [See CONFIG.md for details]({config_url})

data_description.heater_entity: The number entity that controls your boiler's target water temperature
data_description.flow_temp_entity: Measures water temperature leaving the boiler
data_description.return_temp_entity: Measures water temperature returning to the boiler
data_description.outdoor_temp_entity: Used to adjust heating based on weather conditions
data_description.solar_power_entity: Reduces heating when solar panels produce enough power

global.title: Temperature Limits
global.description: Set the operating range for your heating system.

data_description.min_egress: Water temperature when heating demand is minimal (e.g., 25°C)
data_description.max_egress: Water temperature at full heating demand (e.g., 55°C)
data_description.min_ignition_level: Heating won't start until demand exceeds this percentage
data_description.solar_threshold: Reduce heating when solar production exceeds this (Watts)
data_description.solar_drop: How much to lower water temperature when solar limit is reached

zones.title: Add Heating Zone {zone_count}
zones.description: Configure a room or area with its own temperature control.

data_description.zone_name: Give this room a name (e.g., Living Room, Bedroom)
data_description.zone_temp_entity: The thermometer measuring this room's temperature
data_description.zone_valve_entity: The valve or thermostat that controls heating to this room
data_description.zone_window_entity: Pauses heating when on/open (binary sensor or input boolean)
data_description.zone_schedule_entity: Automatically adjust temperature based on time of day
data_description.zone_default_setpoint: Target temperature when no schedule is active
data_description.kp: Higher = faster response, but may overshoot (typical: 20-50)
data_description.ki: Higher = more precise, but slower to settle (typical: 0.01-0.5)
data_description.kd: Higher = smoother, less overshooting (typical: 50-150 for underfloor)
data_description.ke: Boost heating when it's cold outside (typical: 0.01-0.03)
data_description.add_another: Enable to add more rooms after this one

error.invalid_temp_range: Maximum temperature must be higher than minimum
error.zone_name_exists: A room with this name already exists

abort.already_configured: This integration is already set up
abort.no_zones: No zones configured yet. Add a zone first.
